short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Try to beat your AI Opponent in a game of rock paper scissors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Roshambo is the ultimate Chrome extension that brings the classic game of Rock, Paper, Scissors to life right in your new tab page! Turn your dull new tab into an engaging battleground where you can face off against a cunning AI opponent.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Roshambo extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
